segments.text: Do you live in the red house at the end of the road ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I live in that house with my parents and my sister .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We also have a cat and a dog .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you take your dog for a walk every day ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . My father takes the dog for a walk every Monday , Tuesday and Sunday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I take the dog for a walk every Wednesday , Thursday and Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who takes the dog on Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: On Saturday we all go to the park and the dog comes with us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you help with the housework ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My mum and my sister do the housework and cooking but I clean my room .
segments.speaker: S2
